about_the_game:
Astroball is a physics based platformer set in space. Explore 31 levels full of different obstacles and paths, unlocking unique skins that alter the physics of your ball, on your way to collect all the gold medals!

Key Features:

  • Physics-based movement and interaction with the ball

  • Easy to learn, hard to master mechanics.

  • 31 unique levels with 4 different themes.

  • Multiple different objects that can help or hinder your run

  • A few steam achievements to strive for

  • Game progression through Bronze, Silver and Gold Medals.

name: Astroball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Snapdragon X Elite
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Snapdragon X Elite
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Astroball is a physics based platformer set in space. Explore 31 levels full of different obstacles and paths, unlocking unique skins that alter the physics of your ball, on your way to collect all the gold medals!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
